register_description:
StudyTime is a databank you can use to manage your own productivity.
Choose a subject and the time you want to spend studying for it with an optional deadline. 
If you don't want one (or don't have one yet), don't click the checkbox.
subject: Subject
tooltip_databank: Your account name has to be at least 3 symbols long.
tooltip_password: Your password must be between 6 and 16 symbols.
tooltip_subject: A subject is something you want to study, like German.
tooltip_hours: How many hours you want to spend on this subject. You may change this later.
tooltip_deadline: If you want a deadline, click on this box. You may change this later.
